summary: Retextures werewolves to look like hyenas.
descriptionHtml:
Ever find yourself roaming around Skyrim's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]tropical landscape[/url] and thinking, "man, I'd really love to live out my sick animalistic fantasy of being an apex predator and preying on lesser beings"? Well if you have, you are in luck!

This mod retextures werewolves into werehyenas and inverts the sizes of male and female weres so the males are smaller and the females are larger for a more hyena-tastic experience.

Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33466/?]Tropical Animals - Horse Replacers and Wild Zebra[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25392/?]Werewolf Mastery[/url]
author: Duckstapler
